# CSS Classes Vista provides CSS classes for styling components. ## Layout Classes - **.row**: Display as row - **.col**: Display as column - **.center**: Center content - **.flex**: Flexbox container ## Spacing Classes - **.m-1** to **.m-5**: Margin - **.p-1** to **.p-5**: Padding ## Text Classes - **.text-left**: Left align - **.text-center**: Center align - **.text-right**: Right align - **.bold**: Bold text - **.italic**: Italic text ## Color Classes - **.bg-primary**: Primary background - **.text-primary**: Primary text - **.text-muted**: Muted text ## See Also - [Theme Variables](/wiki/shared/styles/theme-variables/) - Theme customization - [Responsive Design](/wiki/shared/styles/responsive-design/) - Responsive utilities
